data.text:
Detailed Solution

Download Solution PDF

The correct answer is Turn Your Body to the Sun.

Key Points

The Dutch documentary film “Turn Your Body to the Sun” has won the Golden Conch award for the Best Documentary Film at MIFF 2022.

The top award of the Mumbai International Film Festival for Documentary, Short Fiction and Animation Films was presented by the Governor of Maharashtra Bhagat Singh Koshiyari.

The award carries a Golden Conch, a certificate, and a cash prize of Rs 1 million.

Additional Information

Filmmaker Shaunak Sen's documentary "All That Breathes" has been honoured with the 2022 L'OEil d'Or award.

The L'OEil d'Or documentary award, also known as The Golden Eye award, was created in 2015 by French-speaking authors' society LaScam in collaboration with the Cannes Film Festival.

17th edition of Mumbai International Film festival (MIFF) is being held from 29 May-4 June 2022 at Nehru Centre Auditorium, Worli, Mumbai.

​The Mumbai International Film Festival for Documentary, Short and Animation Films is a festival organized in the city of Mumbai by the Films Division, Ministry of Information and Broadcasting, Government of India.

It was started in 1990 and focuses on documentary, short fiction, and animation films.

The 16th Mumbai International Film Festival was held from 28 January to 3 February 2020.
